name: @vdimensions/forest-js-frontend
description: A javascript frontend for Forest-based applications

scripts.bump_patch: npm version patch --force && git add package.json && git commit -m 'bumped patch version'
scripts.bump_minor: npm version minor --force && git add package.json && git commit -m 'bumped minor version'
scripts.bump_major: npm version major --force && git add package.json && git commit -m 'bumped major version'

author: Virtual Dimensions
